contexts.context: ...with thieves today," said Lledos, "Is the lack of <mark>technique</mark>. I know there's no honor among thieves, and there...
...name I won't mention, swears by the strangle-and-slash <mark>technique</mark>. Simply put, you grab your victim's throat from behind...
"The classic <mark>technique</mark>, which requires less grappling than my friend's variation, is...
